translation.ko: 모든 걸 애스터가 아는 너로 가르칠 시간은 없어, 선택해야 해

translation.en: so we have to be selective. Deep versus broad-based learning.
translation.ko: 모든 걸 애스터가 아는 너로 가르칠 시간은 없어, 선택해야 해 심층 학습 대 광범위 학습

translation.en: -Huh? -We spy on her, then cram you on her greatest hits.
translation.ko: 걜 정탐해서 걔가 좋아하는 것들로 널 포장하는 거야

translation.en: So, in No Exit, three people are trapped in hell.
translation.ko: '닫힌 방'엔 지옥에 갇힌 세 사람이 나와

translation.en: A door opens, but nobody leaves.
[Paul] That's nuts. He can't stand these people.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 그 사람들을 못 견뎌하면서

translation.en: A door opens and he doesn't leave?
[Ellie] He's trapped in hell. It's a metaphor for existence.
translation.ko: 지옥에 갇힌 거야 실존에 대한 은유지

translation.en: [Paul] My nana hated Minnesota. She left.
[Ellie] Your nana wasn't one of the great thinkers of the 20th century.
-[Paul] Nana's not trapped in hell either. -[Ellie groans]
Hey! Hey, where are you going?
You're like some marvelous, distant, well, queen, I guess.
translation.ko: 당신은 경이롭고 먼 존재 마치 여왕 같군요

translation.en: [Hepburn] I don't want to be worshiped, I want to be loved.
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 건 숭배가 아니라 사랑이에요

translation.en: Key thing about The Philadelphia Story is it's a plea for tolerance.
Check this out. I'm calling it taco sausage. Do you want a bite?
translation.ko: 이거 봐봐 타코 소시지라고 불러 한 입 먹을래?

translation.en: Two hand foods, one great taste.
translation.ko: 맛있는 거 더하기 맛있는 거 더 맛있는 거

translation.en: I hit one and then you...
We're writing a profile on the student we most admire.
translation.ko: 제일 뛰어난 학생 프로필을 작성 중인데

translation.en: -Views on women in the workplace? -Does Aster like lean meats?
translation.ko: - 직장여성에 대한 견해는? - 애스터는 살코기 좋아해?

translation.en: -I'm good cop. -Then how come you aren't smiling?
translation.ko: - 내가 착한 경찰이잖아 - 근데 왜 안 웃어?

translation.en: I'll smile when you follow the plan that I carefully--
translation.ko: 네가 계획대로 하면 웃을게 주의깊게 짠...

translation.en: I'm surprised more kids haven't asked to interview me. Huh.
I'm going in. I'm going in with my smile.
[announcer] Looks like The Moose have a man open.
Not if it's not time to eat.
Hey, uh, can I ask you a question?
I don't want to try a taco sausage.
Just, like, your dad seems so unhappy here and you also seem kind of unhappy.
translation.ko: 너희 아빤 진짜 불행한 것 같고 너도 좀 불행한 것 같아서

translation.en: No, you're not taking this seriously. I have a ton of work I have to do.
translation.ko: 싫어, 진지하게 안 하잖아 난 할 일이 잔뜩 있다고

translation.en: No, just, you're so smart. Like, too smart to, like--
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 진짜 똑똑해서 이러기엔 너무 똑똑...

translation.en: Waste my time trying to win you a girl who'll never look your way?
translation.ko: 네 쪽은 거들떠보지도 않을 애 사귀게 해주느라 시간 버리기엔?
- 아니, 그냥 좀 이상해서 - 네가 이상해!

translation.en: -Enjoy your happy life in Squahamish. -No, no...
The thing about No Exit is it's like how what I really want is to run my own shop,
translation.ko: '닫힌 방'은 꼭 내가 내 가게를 얼마나 원하는지 같아

translation.en: with new recipes. And-- And FYI, taco sausage is really effing good.
translation.ko: 새 레시피로 말이야 참고로 타코 소시지는 진짜 끝내줘

translation.en: Okay, but I'm the fourth son
and my family's been making the same sausage for 49 years
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 49년 동안 똑같은 소시지를 만들고 있는데

translation.en: and it doesn't matter if they're going broke, or out of style,
translation.ko: 쫄딱 망하든 유행에 뒤쳐지든 상관 없어

translation.en: they're Nana's recipes. If Ma can't have Nana, at least she can make her sausages.
translation.ko: 할머니 레시피라 엄만 할머니 대신 할머니 소시지라도 만들어야 하지

translation.en: If I break away, it'll break her heart. And it's either her heart or mine.
translation.ko: 내가 독립하면 엄마 마음은 찢어질 거야, 아니면 내 마음이

translation.en: We had to go where my dad could get a job.
translation.ko: 우린 아빠 일자리가 있는 데로 와야 했어

translation.en: he became the station manager at Squahamish.
The plan was to be promoted to system engineer.
It turns out speaking good English trumps having a PhD.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 영어 실력이 박사학위를 능가하더라고

translation.en: -He's not bad. -I don't speak very good either.
translation.ko: - 못 하지 않아 - 나도 잘 못 해

translation.en: How do you feel about pot roast?
I should get back to the station.
I know, but we've gotta eat.
Would you like to weigh in or are you just gonna scream throughout the meal?
translation.ko: 좀 거들 거야, 아님 밥 먹는 내내 소리만 지를 거야?

translation.en: I'll deal with the dog wrestling.
[Paul] Or we could go to your place?
Match energy, match strokes, and just say one thing.
translation.ko: 힘 조절하고 타격 조절하고 한 가지만 말해

translation.en: Okay. Good. That wasn't so hard.

translation.ko: 난 대화 연습 안 해도 돼

translation.en: It just seems like a really short conversation.
I was born in Xuzhou, China.
[Mr. Flores] How does Satan get his message through?
Outside are the dogs, the sorcerers, the immoral persons. [groans]
-No, he causes us to question. -[phone vibrates]

translation.ko: 신을 믿는 우리 마음에 대한 의문

translation.en: -Satan plants the seed of doubt... -[phone vibrates]
We're lucky to live in a good town like Squahamish.
translation.ko: 운 좋게도 우린 스쿼하미시처럼 좋은 마을에 살지만

translation.en: Let us stay strong against Satan's call,
lest sin creep in and destroy the good life God has prepared for us.
translation.ko: 죄로 인해 하나님께서 예비하신 복된 삶이 무너지지 않게 합시다

translation.en: You know what it's like to finally meet someone your age who gets you?
translation.ko: 드디어 날 이해해주는 또래 친구를 만난 기분이 어떤지 하세요?

translation.en: You know where else you can meet people your age who get you?
translation.ko: 널 이해해주는 또래 친구를 어디서 또 만날 수 있는지 아니?

translation.en: Do pineapple, owl, caterpillar with glasses.
[Paul] Glasses make the caterpillar look smart.
-Does braised pork have five-spice powder? -How do you know five-spice powder?
translation.ko: - 돼지찜에 오향분 들어가? - 오향분을 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: I kind of creeped in your cabinets.
I'm always looking for new spices.
Giving up on the taco sausage?
Oh, no way. I've been writing to the paper in Wenatchee for months now.
translation.ko: 설마! 몇 달째 위네치에 있는 신문사에 편지를 쓰고 있어

translation.en: If I could just get the guy to taste it.
What do the other Munskys think?
Taco sausage has a nice ring to it.
I bet she would've tried the taco sausage.
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 분명 타코 소시지 드셨을 거야

translation.en: What do you like about Aster?
And she smells like fresh-ground flour.
What else could I like about her?
How her eyes look right into yours.
she twirls her hair when she's reading.
busts out like she can't help herself and she stops being so perfect
translation.ko: 도저히 참지 못하겠다는 듯 아주 잠깐 완벽하길

translation.en: She has at least five different voices.
How you could live in an ocean of her thoughts and...
translation.ko: 네가 어떻게 그 애의 생각의 바다에 머물며
- 내 말은... - 아니, 난 정말 멍청해

translation.en: -Don't think that I-- -No, what you said.
translation.ko: - 그런 생각 하지 마 - 아니, 네가 한 말

translation.en: That's what you say when you love someone.
No, I-- I was just talking.
-I would never, ever actually-- -No, it is.
And-- And you don't even care.
I mean, I love her and I can't even...
translation.ko: 난 걔를 사랑하는 데도 그렇게 못...

translation.en: I mean, with the possible exception of my dad with my mom...
translation.ko: 어쩌면 우리 아빠가 엄마한테 공들인 건 빼고

translation.en: And if love isn't the effort you put in...
[Ellie] I can't believe you drink Yakult.
Coach is gonna provide it free. Keeps him regular.
translation.ko: 코치가 공짜로 줄 거야 덕분에 화장실 잘 간대

translation.en: The only Asian grocery is three hours by bike.
Do not run after her train.
[Paul] Uh, it shows that he cares.
That girl's thinking, "Thank God I got out before wasting my life on that idiot."
translation.ko: 저 여자는 멍청이한테 인생 낭비 안 해서 다행이라 생각할걸

translation.en: ♪ As the night tore and spun around ♪
[Ellie] Lost track of time practicing for the senior talent show.
translation.ko: 졸업반 탤런트쇼 연습하느라 시간 가는 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: A little freaked about it, but whatever. Okay.
translation.ko: 좀 겁은 나지만 알게 뭐람, 됐어

translation.en: Aster. If she brings up immigration, you've been talking about the recent--
translation.ko: 애스터, 이민 얘길 꺼내면 너희 둘이 요즘에 한 얘기가...

translation.en: -I know. -When in doubt, if the name is Italian,
translation.ko: - 알아 - 잘 모를 때, 이탈리아 이름이면

translation.en: I'm probably gonna crash and burn, but...
thanks for sticking it out with me anyway.
-not like you didn't pay me. -[gentle scoff]
You're not gonna crash and burn.
You're totally gonna crash and burn.
-I was wondering-- -What about the immigration bill?
We don't have to talk about...
What were you about to say?

translation.ko: 내 생각에 넌... "스미스코로나 내 생각에 넌"

translation.en: [Paul over speaker] I don't want to be just friends.
I think you're pretty and funny
and smart and your laughter, it's like...
Like five oceans of thoughts. Like five...
I don't... I don't know what to say.
[Paul] What up, haters? Who rocked their second date?
translation.ko: 어떠냐? 두 번째 데이트를 성공리에 치른 게 누구지?

translation.en: -Number 86, Paul Munsky! -[music plays softly over speakers]
And now, his side-girl's gonna rock the senior recital.
translation.ko: 이제 그의 여조수가 졸업반 리사이틀을 성공리에 치를 것이다

translation.en: -You're gonna be awesome. -I'm gonna be puking.
You're always playing for an audience.
Oh, did I tell you that some food guy from the paper in Tukwila wrote me?
translation.ko: 내가 말했나? 투퀼라 신문사 음식면 담당자한테 연락 온 거?

translation.en: He must have heard about me from the guy in Wenatchee.
He likes how my sausage sounds and he wants to try it.
translation.ko: 소시지 이름이 마음에 들어서 먹어 보고 싶대

translation.en: what did you and Aster talk about?
You know, we got milkshakes and fries.
And then she had curfew, so we walked back to her car and...
translation.ko: 그러다 걘 통금 시간이 있어서 차까지 데려다 주고

translation.en: How do you know she wants to be kissed?
Okay, she gives you a look and, when you see the look, you make your move.
translation.ko: 상대가 널 쳐다보는데 그렇게 보면, 하는 거야

translation.en: Otherwise you look like a real putz.
-Hmm. -And now we've got, like, a date date,
not just a friend date, when she gets back from some youth group in Sacramento.
translation.ko: 진짜 데이트야, 걔가 새크라멘토 청년부 모임에서 돌아오면

translation.en: There are dressing rooms, you know.
You know, without the jeans and the flannel shirt...
It just doesn't look like you.
Go to the dressing room. I'll toss you some things.
translation.ko: 탈의실로 가 내가 몇 개 건네줄게

translation.en: Well, our next senior needs no introduction.
-♪ And still sometimes remember ♪ -Oh, my God!
Ellie Chu, three minutes till go time. Last chance to pee.
translation.ko: 엘리 추, 3분 전이야 화장실 가려면 지금 가

translation.en: [crowd] Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! -Trig! Trig! Trig! Trig! -[music stops]
[announcer] All right, let's give it up next for...
♪ As the night tore and spun around ♪
♪ And we had to get lost ♪
When did Ellie Chu get kinda hot?
I just wanted to tell you we've had math together all four years
translation.ko: 할 말이 있어, 우리 4년 내내 수학 수업 같이 들었는데

translation.en: and I always wanted to say that I like your nails.
translation.ko: 꼭 말해주고 싶었어 네 손톱 참 예뻐

translation.en: Yeah. Can't get the bike grease out.
Do you want to play Drinkers of Catan?
Okay. So it's like Settlers, but just, when you cross a fairway,

translation.en: you take three shots and you just keep going.
-[boys] Oh! -That's a lot! That's a lot!
I will trade you wheat for rye.
that I can tell I have been drinking spirits.
translation.ko: 내가 술 마시고 있는 거 나도 알아

translation.en: Because I have to pee far more often...
than would be indicated by plain punch.
So don't think I haven't been monitoring the situation.
translation.ko: 그러니까 내가 상황을 잘 파악 못 하고 있다고 생각하지 마

translation.en: Cool, cool. How many cups have you monitored?
[mom] He's at practice, but you can leave it in his room.
[Aster] Yeah, it's just something silly I thought he'd like.
translation.ko: 네, 별 건 아닌데 좋아할 것 같아서요

translation.en: We went as far as Sekiu once,
but we never made it all the way to California.
You're quite the little traveler. I would love to go to California.
translation.ko: 넌 여행자구나 나도 캘리포니아에 가보고 싶다

translation.en: -[Aster chuckles] -Oh, it's Paul's Chinese friend. I didn't hear you come in.
translation.ko: 아, 폴의 중국 친구구나 들어오는 소리 못 들었는데

translation.en: I was just, um, dropping off some books.
-Aster was just dropping off-- Tommy! -[loud whirring upstairs]
So, uh, you-- you and Paul, you guys...
Oh, God, no. No, no, no. He is, like, totally, 100% into you.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 아니! 아니야! 걔는 완전히, 100% 너한테 빠졌어

translation.en: He wanted to do some extra reading so...
I think I almost drove him off.
I can be such a nervous idiot.
You could never be an idiot.
translation.ko: 넌 절대 바보가 될 수 없어

translation.en: I mean, Paul would never think that about you, because he's way into you.
translation.ko: 폴은 절대 그렇게 생각 안 할 거라고, 정말 널 좋아하거든

translation.en: -I should get back to the station. -No, yeah, no.
Oh, it's just some silly thing I made on my trip.
translation.ko: 아, 그냥 여행 중에 그린 유치한 그림이야

translation.en: I like this stroke off to the side.
translation.ko: 옆으로 난 이 선이 마음에 들어

translation.en: I already lied to my dad about where I'd be.
translation.ko: 나 어디 있는지 아빠한테 거짓말 했거든

translation.en: You get to do that every day?
Twice. 6:40 a.m. and 11:40 p.m weekdays. 12:10 p.m. and 9:20 p.m weekends.
translation.ko: 두 번, 주 중엔 아침 6시 40분 밤 11시 40분 주말엔 오후 12시 10분 밤 9시 20분

translation.en: -It's a real blast. -No, it's-- it's so...
Oh, well. At least you rule something.
Do you want to get outta here?
-♪ You think you know ♪ -To my favorite secret place.
We don't have trees like this in Sacramento.
things die off in summer, turn green in winter.
translation.ko: 여름엔 하나씩 죽고 겨울엔 초록으로 변해

translation.en: Is that where you grew up?
There's no cell service here, so...
[Aster] It's like no one can reach us here.
[Ellie] Taylor Swift's yacht saves the day.
I don't think I've ever hung out with a girl and not talked about boys before.
translation.ko: 남자 얘기 안 하는 여자애랑 있는 건 처음인 것 같아

translation.en: It's like when I'm with him...
I overheard Trig talking to my dad about...
translation.ko: 트리그가 우리 아빠한테 얘기하는 걸 우연히 들었어

translation.en: I mean, he hasn't even asked me yet, but...
God doesn't know either, if it's any consolation.
I wish I knew what I believed.
translation.ko: 난 내가 믿는 게 뭔지 알고 싶어

translation.en: I keep asking God for a sign.
And then Paul's letter appeared in my locker.
-I am a Russian doll of clothing. -[laughing]
Gravity is matter's response to loneliness.
-Then you said it. -♪ To leave it all behind ♪
She said every song, movie, story...
translation.ko: 모든 노래와 영화, 이야기엔 제일 멋진 부분이

translation.en: -♪ Is love that's hard to find ♪ -That was it.
I hope you find something good to believe in.
translation.ko: 네가 믿을 수 있는 뭔가를 찾기 바라

translation.en: -I'm getting married, Walter. -You can't. You're a newspaper man.
translation.ko: 나 결혼해요, 월터 안 돼, 당신은 신문 기자요

translation.en: That's why I'm quitting. I want to go someplace where I can be a woman.

translation.ko: 언론에 대한 배신 당신은 언론인이오, 힐디

[in Mandarin] Paul made a braised pork sausage. Pretty tasty.

translation.en: I, uh... I got your painting.
[man] Paulie, are you marrying the garbage out there?

translation.ko: "엘리, 남자애들이 서로 엉덩이 냄새 맡는 건 꼭 봐야지!"

translation.en: [announcer] Looks like another blowout with the Squahamish Moose down by 49.

translation.en: Less than a minute left on the clock. Players are lining up for the punt.

translation.en: There's an awful lot of confusion out there.
Looks like the punter is trying to free the ball up
translation.ko: 펀터는 공을 멀리 던져 이 짜증나는 경기에서

translation.en: and salvage a few yards out of this horribly crooked play.
-[grunting] -Oh! The punter takes a savage hit.
And Number 86 Paul Munsky's got the ball.
Squahamish Moose have scored! First time in 15 years. [chuckles]
We're on the board! We're on the board! We're on the board! We're on the board! We're on the board!
You, uh, you didn't have to get me a Yakult.
No, no, I don't, uh, want a Yakult.
Uh... Nah, I need to talk to you.
Okay. Uh, my hands are full. Could you...
-What are you doing? -You don't want me to kiss you?

translation.en: I know why you're always hanging around.
Okay, it was just supposed to be one letter.

I am in love with you.
Hey, hey, hey! This is cashmere fleece, man!

you don't want anything about her...

our final reading today will be from Trig Carson.
